channel.title: ps_customtext on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in ps_customtext on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Delete text and check error message
item.description: Delete text and check error message Preconditions Go to back office -> Modules -> Module manager Search ps_customtext The module should be installed and upgraded to the last version Click on Configure Steps Step Description Expected result Remove all the text and save Error message should be displayed

item.title: Upgrade
item.description: Upgrade Preconditions The module should be installed with the previous version Steps Step Description Expected result Go to back office -> Modules -> Module manager and search ps_customtext The module page should be displayed and module ps_customtext should appear in the module page Click on upgrade The message “Notice! L’action Upgrade sur le module ps_customtext a réussi.” should appear in green to indicate that the module is upgraded Refresh the page The module should be upgraded to the last version

item.title: Change text and check FO
item.description: Change text and check FO Preconditions Go to back office -> Modules -> Module manager Search ps_customtext The module should be installed and upgraded to the last version Click on Configure Steps Step Description Expected result Remove the text, add another text (with color and some specific character)and save New text should be saved Go to front office New text should be displayed instead of the old one

item.title: Uninstall/Install
item.description: Uninstall/Install Preconditions The module should be installed Steps Step Description Expected result Go to back office -> Modules -> Module manger and search ps_customtext The module page should be displayed and module ps_customtext should appear in the module page Click on “uninstall” and confirm the uninstall message by clicking on ok The message “Notice! L’action Uninstall sur le module ps_customtext a réussi.

item.title: Uninstall and delete
item.description: Uninstall and delete Preconditions The module should be installed Steps Step Description Expected result Go to back office -> Modules -> Module manger and search ps_customtext The module page should be displayed and module ps_customtext should appear in the module page Click on “uninstall” and confirm the deletion message by clicking on ok The message “Notice! L’action Uninstall sur le module ps_customtext a réussi.
